basics.name: Ananda Dwi Rahmawati
basics.label: Senior Cloud & DevOps Engineer
basics.summary: Senior Cloud & DevOps Engineer (6+ yrs) specializing in multi-cloud architecture (AWS, Azure, GCP), automation (Terraform, Pulumi), container platforms (EKS, ECS, Kubernetes), cost optimization (70%+), and secure scalable CI/CD. AWS Container Hero & Google Developer Expert.

work.name: ACP Group (GovTech Singapore)
work.position: Cloud & DevOps Engineer – Cloud File Transfer
work.summary: Led modernization, security, observability, and FinOps for multi-env AWS platform.
highlights: Raised IaC coverage 54%→85% using Terraform & Pulumi
Migrated CI/CD to OIDC eliminating long-lived credentials
Implemented full observability stack (CloudWatch, X-Ray, ELK) with proactive canaries
Built multi-stage GitLab pipelines (drift detection, security gates, approvals)
Scaled ECS & RDS; performance tested 100+ services reducing latency
Integrated SonarQube & Snyk; remediated 100+ IAM policy issues
Automated compliance scoring/reporting for 200+ projects
Optimized networking (PrivateLink, Transit Gateway, WAF) & CloudFront (35% latency drop)
Automated ECR image scanning & patching; remediated 200+ vulns pre-prod
Led incident response & Scrum ceremonies; enforced FinOps savings via cleanup scripts

work.name: Activate Interactive Pte Ltd
work.summary: Architected secure high-throughput multi-cloud data platforms (AWS & Alibaba Cloud).
highlights: Migrated on-prem to AWS; achieved $500K+ annual cost savings
Increased IaC coverage 54%→90% (Terraform & Pulumi)
Delivered CI/CD & DevSecOps for 100+ microservices (GitLab, CodePipeline, scans)
Azure solutions (VNet, Firewall, AD integration) with performance & cost optimization
Implemented advanced monitoring & auto-recovery (CloudWatch, Prometheus, ELK, SLS)
Automated resource cleanup & cost controls (Trusted Advisor, Config Rules, Lambda)
Cross-account secure S3 transfers & compliance validation
Improved team velocity by 35% as Scrum Master
Produced architecture & RCA documentation for stakeholders

work.name: PT Boer Technology
work.summary: Designed multi-region private cloud (OpenStack, Ceph) & hybrid automation platforms.
highlights: Served 500+ enterprise clients with 99.9% availability
Automation (Python, Bash, Go) for provisioning & lifecycle management
Monitoring pipelines (Prometheus, Grafana, Alertmanager) achieving 99.5–99.9% uptime
Integrated VMware vSphere/vSAN & NSX with OpenShift and Pure Storage
CI/CD (GitLab, Azure DevOps) with OWASP ZAP & Burp scans
Containerized legacy apps; improved deploy frequency 10×
Multi-cloud migrations (AWS, GCP, Alibaba) with 40% cost & 60% perf gains
Developed internal automation for reporting & documentation

work.name: Freelance / Part-Time
work.summary: Delivered hands-on cloud, DevOps & security training to 1000+ professionals.
highlights: Mastercard Academy & Google Bangkit curricula (GCP, AWS, Kubernetes, ELK)
Certification prep (Linux+, Security+) & advanced labs
Created real-world labs & assessments; 95%+ positive feedback
